subject: Self Care
title: Active Listening
description: Learn Active Listening in one minute.

hook.text: Most people don't listen to understand. They listen to reply. The other person can always tell the difference.

buildup.text: Active listening means full attention: no interrupting, no planning your response, no checking your phone.

discovery.text: Reflecting back what you heard â€” 'So you're saying...' â€” makes people feel understood more than any advice does.

twist.text: Silence is part of listening. Letting a pause sit without filling it invites deeper honesty from the speaker.

climax.text: In your next conversation, try listening for two full minutes without interrupting. Notice what changes.

punchline.text: Listen to understand, not to reply. It changes everything.

quiz.question: What is the most impactful element of active listening?
options: Reflecting back what you heard to show understanding
